content: cecilia cardigan by julia vaconsin everyone needs something comfortable and light weight to throw on when the air cools off on summer evenings this is the perfect cardigan for it © 2009 julia vaconsin juliavaconsin@gmail com difficulty level easy stitches some concentration needed for counting stitches sizing - sizes xs s m l xl xxl 32 35 ½ 39 42 ½ 46 49 ½ inches 80 88 ½ 97 ½ 106 115 123 ½ cm fronts closed cardigan shown in size m pink and fuchia and size s mauve and yellow yarn phildar phil crochet 100% cotton 185m/201 yards per 50g shade 14 crocus 7 7 8 9 10 11 skeins and 08 fuchsia 1 1 1 2 2 2 skeins shade 18 lavande and 17 anis for the mauve/yellow version yardage for yarn subsitution 1355 1475 1675 1825 2055 2245 yards of fingering weight cotton 1240 1350 1530 1670 1880 2050 meters hook us 0 2 5 mm hook notions seven ½ 12 mm buttons gauge 23 double_crochet x 13 row to 4 inches 10 cm pattern notes the cardigan is worked in separate pieces which are sewn together before the edgings are worked all the pieces are worked in double_crochet single_crochet and slip stitches are used on decrease row the edgings are worked in single_crochet on decrease row sl sts do not count towards the final st count this pattern is written according to us crochet terminology for uk/ nz /aus equivalents see table below © 2009 julia vaconsin juliavaconsin@gmail com us uk nz aus single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet abbreviations st s stitch es chain chain single_crochet single_crochet decrease single_crochet 2 together double_crochet double_crochet decrease double_crochet 2 together slip_stitch slip_stitch © 2009 julia vaconsin juliavaconsin@gmail com instructions back chain 94 104 114 124 134 144 row 1 rs double_crochet in 4th chain from hook and in each across turn 92 102 112 122 132 142 sts row 2 chain 3 counts as first double_crochet here and throughout skip first st double_crochet across turn work 2 row even start waist decreases row 5 chain 3 skip first st decrease double_crochet to last 3 sts decrease double_crochet 1 turn 90 100 110 120 130 140 sts work 2 2 3 3 3 3 row even next row repeat row 5 88 98 108 118 128 138 sts work 2 2 2 2 3 3 row even next row repeat row 5 86 96 106 116 126 136 sts work 2 row even repeat last 3 row 3 more times 80 90 100 110 120 130 sts work 3 more row even start waist increases row 1 chain 3 do not skip first st double_crochet in first st and across to last 2 sts double_crochet 2 in next st double_crochet 1 in last st turn 82 92 102 112 122 132 sts work 2 row even repeat last 3 row 1 more time 84 94 104 114 124 134 sts next row repeat row 1 increase row 86 96 106 116
